item.title: Mixmag Review of Yellow (Dub Mix)
item.description:
Mixmag Review of Yellow (Dub Mix)

Heads down moodiness from James Kumo as he throws in a nice little dub mix version of 'Yellow'. The original version is way more airy and light, whereas the flip takes its cue from a muted bassline which are completely counteracted by a razor sharp hat.

item.description:
Ibiza Voice - Interview

In The Groove with KMusic - Interview with label owner James Kumo - I Voice Hype, Lies & Gossip

item.title: Yellow EP (Incl Dan Curtin & Binny Remixes) - Video
item.description:
Yellow EP (Incl Dan Curtin & Binny Remixes) - Video

Supported by François Kevorkian, Laurent Garnier, DJ Rolando, Radio Slave, Osunlade, Orde Meikle, Danny Howells, Mr G, Honey Dijon...and more.

item.title: Marcel Dettmann plays James Kumo “Tunnel Vision” at Richie Hawtin’s ENTER night, SPACE Ibiza
item.description: Marcel Dettmann plays James Kumo “Tunnel Vision” at Richie Hawtin’s ENTER night, SPACE Ibiza

item.title: James Kumo on Bandcamp
item.description:
James Kumo on Bandcamp

DJ, Producer James Kumo has recorded for some of the finest underground electronic music labels, Ann Aimee, Falkplatz, Dan Curtin's Metamorphic recordings, Curle & KMusic to name a few. He has also DJ'd for over 20 years, spinning house and techno at various international clubs, including London, New York, Cape Town, Dublin, Manchester and more.

item.title: Yellow Including Dan Curtin & Binny Remix at Juno Records
item.description:
Yellow Including Dan Curtin & Binny Remix at Juno Records

François Kevorkian (Wavemusic/Deep Space NYC) - “Loving the original and Dan Curtin remix!”Laurent Garnier - “Very cool EP all together"DJ Rolando (Underground Resistance/Detroit) - “Dub mix is the one for me, Dope stuff!”Radio Slave (Rekids/Berlin) - “Definitely play this!”Osunlade (Yoruba) - “bassass!!”Orde Meikle (Slam / Soma) - “great tunes thanx”Danny Howells (Dig Deeper) - “This is a monster .. massive originals and a Curtin mix too, thanks so much!”Kirk Degiorgio - “superb EP - beautiful…”Honey Dijon - “Yellow Main Mix is gorgeous. Def support.”Brett Johnson (Classic) - “Nice release, feeling the org. and Dan's mix. Thanks”Mr G (Rekids) - “nice”Vince Watson (Bedrock / Cocoon / Ovum / Planet E / Poker Flat / Yoruba) – “Cracking release this....defo support on some of these for my 313 mix sessions :)Matrixmann (Dekmantel / Ghostly) (San Francisco) – “Beautiful work.”Truncate/Audio Injection (Truncate) (Los Angeles) – “Great stuff!”DJ Deep (Deeply Rooted House) (Paris) – “very nice tracks”

item.title: Tsugi Magazine Paris Podcast
item.description:
Tsugi Magazine Paris Podcast

Podcast mixed and recorded for Paris based Tsugi magazine, featuring music from Maceo Plex, Shonky, Dan Ghenacia, The Heels Of Love, Federico Gandin, Bonar Bradberry, Todd Terje...and more.
